channel.title: Minecraft IRC Channel
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/DAUqQ.gif[/img][/center]
This channel is strictly for Minecraft-related discussion.
If you already are an IRC user, here are the details: Server: irc.moparisthebest.xxx Port: 6667 Channel: #minecraft
Alternatively, you can enter the channel using the webclient! http://www.moparisthebest.com/irc.php?img=0&host=irc.moparisthebest.xxx&channel=minecraft
